522075:
You've got my soul,
And you've got my heartache too,
Cause if you fall,
You know I will fall with you,
Never known a love so true,
Every breath I'm breathing you,
There's a million dreams out there,
Waiting to take us anywhere

I don't want to lose this time,
Don't want this to end right now,
Listen to the sound of love,
...
